alert.note: Alert for Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 2:17PM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Morehouse and West Carroll Counties. In Mississippi, Leflore County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, dotd.la.gov in Louisiana and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
